005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
009import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
010
011public interface IFieldDefinition extends IModelDefinition, IValuedDefinition, IField {
012
013  @Override
014  default boolean isInline() {
015    // not inline by default
016    return false;
017  }
018
019  @Override
020  default IFieldInstance getInlineInstance() {
021    // not inline by default
022    return null;
023  }
024
025  /**
026   * Retrieves the key to use as the field name for this field's value in JSON.
027   *
028   * @return a string or a FlagInstance value
029   */
030  @Nullable
031  default Object getJsonValueKey() {
032    Object retval = getJsonValueKeyFlagInstance();
033    if (retval == null) {
034      retval = getEffectiveJsonValueKeyName();
035    }
036    return retval;
037  }
038
039  /**
040   * Check if a JSON value key flag is configured.
041   *
042   * @return {@code true} if a JSON value key flag is configured, or {@code false}
043   *         otherwise
044   */
045  default boolean hasJsonValueKeyFlagInstance() {
046    return getJsonValueKeyFlagInstance() != null;
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Retrieves the flag instance who's value will be used as the "value key".
051   *
052   * @return the configured flag instance, or {@code null} if a flag is not
053   *         configured as the "value key"
054   */
055  @Nullable
056  IFlagInstance getJsonValueKeyFlagInstance();
057
058  /**
059   * Retrieves the configured static label to use as the value key, or the type
060   * specific name if a label is not configured.
061   *
062   * @return the value key label
063   */
064  @Nullable
065  String getJsonValueKeyName();
066
067  /**
068   * Retrieves the configured static label to use as the value key, or the type
069   * specific name if a label is not configured.
070   *
071   * @return the value key label
072   */
073  @NonNull
074  default String getEffectiveJsonValueKeyName() {
075    String retval = getJsonValueKeyName();
076    if (retval == null || retval.isEmpty()) {
077      retval = getJavaTypeAdapter().getDefaultJsonValueKey();
078    }
079    return retval;
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Get the value of the field's value from the field item object.
084   *
085   * @param item
086   *          the field item
087   * @return the field's value or {@code null} if it has no value
088   */
089  default Object getFieldValue(@NonNull Object item) {
090    // no value by default
091    return null;
092  }
093}
